roleset.name: spatially closer than or closest

role.descr: in front of what (thing in back)

example.text: Our room was front of house

roleset.name: be straightfoward and honest with

role.descr: speaker, one who is direct and honest

example.name: All args
example.text: The mechanic was very up front and honest about the extent of the problem with us.
example.arg: about the extent of the problem

roleset.note: Based on google data. Comparison to straightforward.01. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie.
